protein.general_function: Involved in 2 iron, 2 sulfur cluster binding
protein.specific_function: Plays a key role in regulating maximal capacity for electron transport and oxidative phosphorylation. May be involved in Fe-S cluster shuttling and/or in redox reactions

reference.reference_text: Taminelli GL, Sotomayor V, Valdivieso AG, Teiber ML, Marin MC, Santa-Coloma TA: CISD1 codifies a mitochondrial protein upregulated by the CFTR channel. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2008 Jan 25;365(4):856-62. Epub 2007 Nov 29.
